CustomField.description: Use to add SysDivBillTo field for Contact Search Layout results
CustomField.formula: IF(Account.Legacy_System_Cd__c="03", "SW" &" "& Account.Legacy_Division_Cd__c &" "& Account.AccountNumber, Account.Legacy_System_Cd__c &" "& Account.Legacy_Division_Cd__c &" "& Account.AccountNumber)
CustomField.label: Account SysDivBillTo
